content.en: Precision Medicine: Scientists are using algorithms to predict various outcomes in breast cancer patients. These algorithms, such as support vector machine algorithm, algorithmic gene expression-based signature, and clinical risk prediction algorithms, analyze gene expression data to determine the likelihood of pathologic complete response, distant recurrence, disease recurrence, and therapeutic response. By combining different gene expression data and risk scores, these algorithms can help doctors make more accurate predictions and tailor treatment plans for individual patients.
content.da: Præcisionsmedicin: Forskere anvender algoritmer til at forudsige forskellige udfald hos brystkræftpatienter. Disse algoritmer, såsom supportvektormaskinealgoritmen, algoritmisk genekspressionsbaseret signatur og kliniske risikoforudsigelsesalgoritmer, analyserer genekspressionsdata for at bestemme sandsynligheden for patologisk komplet respons, fjernrecidiv, sygdomsrecidiv og terapeutisk respons. Ved at kombinere forskellige genekspressionsdata og risikoscores kan disse algoritmer hjælpe læger med at lave mere præcise forudsigelser og skræddersy behandlingsplaner til individuelle patienter.
